txt.en: Build a classy snowman at a snowpile
Found a top hat in Winter-home
Found an acorn among the trees of Frostbluff
Virgil Greenfield wants you to help him fill the snowman field outside of Winter-home.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Gathered coal near the servants' oven
Built a classy snowman at a snowpile

This is one of Virgil's snowmen. Clearly, Virgil was trying to appeal to Mayor Goodnough with this snowman. This is truly the most dashing snowman in Frostbluff.\n\nTo even attempt to match Virgil's craftsmanship, you will need to find a top hat, a scarf, sticks, an acorn, and coal. Perhaps you can find everything you need scattered about Frostbluff.
The materials you need to replicate Virgil's snowman may be found around Frostbluff.\n\nIn order to replicate Virgil's snowman, you will need to gather the right materials.
The snowman-field is outside of Winter-home.\n\nNow that you have gathered all of the necessary supplies, you should head to a snowpile to build your snowman.

'Oh, wonderful, you want to work on this one? Mayor Goodnough will be thrilled with you, that's for sure. He strives to cultivate an air of wealth and class into everything in which he involves himself.

'He wants me to make more of these, but I think it makes more sense to keep things different and exciting. Maybe that's just me, though.

'Anyway, I won't stop you if it means I won't have to do it myself. Good luck!'
Find a top hat in Winter-home
Find an acorn among the trees of Frostbluff
Gather coal near the servants' oven
